name: Who Must Die
description: You are replacing a doctor, charged to find who, among the three patients, is the one that is contaminated. To do this, you can use a whole range of experiments to be performed on the sick. You can also ask the guard to do the dirty work for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core I5 6600k Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core I7 7700k Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 780 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
